about_the_game:
Control the tough and resilient Ox-Head and the agile Horse-Face with your friends to carry out tasks. (It also supports single-player mode and playing with AI teammates.)

Work Content

Evil spirits, due to their many grave mistakes in life and their refusal to repent, carry their sins and are unable to be reincarnated.

The job of Ox-Head and Horse-Face is to punish these evil spirits, make them confess their sins, and help them turn over a new leaf. However, be careful not to let them escape, as this would anger the King of Hell, and the consequences would be severe.

Finally, feed them the Meng Po soup to forget their memories from life, giving them a chance to start anew.

Punishments

There are various ways to punish:

  • Beat them fiercely with your fists

  • Smash them with props

  • Bind the fallen evil spirits to torture devices and whip them vigorously

  • Utilize mechanisms to create a production line

In Your Spare Time

Working in hell also involves interacting with many colleagues and leaders, encountering numerous interesting special events.

After defeating the most terrifying evil spirits in hell and before the day's work is done, don't forget to compare your daily work performance with your teammates. Who will be the outstanding employee of the day?

Main Features

  • Cooperative and competitive play for two players

  • A variety of punishment devices

  • Numerous mechanisms

  • A multitude of evil spirits descending into hell
